altername_name: Another Code: R – Journey into Lost Memories
アナザーコード リコレクション：２つの記憶 / 記憶の扉
name: Another Code: Recollection
overview: Sleuth your way to the truth in two fully enhanced mystery adventures with Another Code: Recollection - featuring: Another Code: Two Memories: Travel to the remote Blood Edward Island as Ashley, a 13 year old girl in search of her father in Another Code: Two Memories. Ashley receives a letter from her father who she believed to be dead, setting off a chain of mysteries and visions into the past. Investigate your surroundings and locales while solving puzzles to reveal the truth in this refreshed retelling of the original Trace Memory game for the Nintendo DS. Another Code: R – Journey into Lost Memories: Experience Ashley’s full story, including the events of the first game’s sequel—Another Code: R – Journey into Lost Memories. Previously unreleased in North America, this second installment completes Ashley’s intriguing tale as she journeys to Lake Juliet two years after the events of the first game to uncover the hidden truth surrounding her mother. Features: • Fully enhanced versions of both original games with overhauled visuals • Fully expanded and explorable environments • New voice acting, puzzles, music, and more • Optional hint and navigation systems (for inexperienced players)
